Greetings from NASCO!

We would like to bring to your attention that your health insurance policy is due for renewal. Below are the details of your existing policy:

Policy Holder : EMILY AQUINO TAMAYO
Policy Period : 22/03/2024 - 21/03/2025
Existing Insurer : ORIENT INSURANCE CO.(PSC) 
Policy Number : P/01/1306/2024/10004

Please note that the renewal offer will be release by your existing insurer, 30 days in advance prior the expiry date.
We will share this information as soon as we received it.
If you have any concern, please do not hesitate to contact us.
